articles.title: Netflix: A Proven Winner, but a Stock Priced for Perfection

articles.summary: GuruFocus.com: Netflix: A Proven Winner, but a Stock Priced for Perfection. Netflix has a proven model and growth potential, but high valuation and weak institutional conviction make the stock less compelling. Related tickers mentioned: DIS.

articles.title: Disney Vs. Netflix: Christmas Streaming Wars And What It Means For The Stocks
articles.mainIdea: Disney Vs. Netflix: Christmas Streaming Wars And What It Means For The Stocks
articles.summary: Benzinga: Disney Vs. Netflix: Christmas Streaming Wars And What It Means For The Stocks. Families settling in for Christmas movie marathons this week are giving Wall Street another reason to watch Walt Disney Co (NYSE:DIS) and Netflix Inc (NASDAQ:NFLX). Hereâ€™s what investors need to know. What To Know: Walt Disney shares traded around $114 on Christmas Eve, up 3% year-to-date, as investors leaned into a holiday slate led by classics on Disney+ and Hulu. The bounce comes after a choppy fall season in which Disney's November quarter showed progress in streaming, but flat overall reven Related tickers mentioned: DIS.
